Name: Lucidity Surge
Description: A wave of consciousness ripples through the dream market
NarrativeText: The dreamers are waking within their dreams. Lucid ingredients surge in value!

Name: Dream Police Raid
Description: Authorities crack down on illegal dream trading
NarrativeText: The Dream Police are patrolling! Nightmare ingredients become risky to trade.
ChoicesJson: [{"Id":"bribe","Text":"Bribe the officers (500 coins)","CoinsCost":500,"ReputationEffect":-5,"ResultText":"They look the other way...for now."},{"Id":"flee","Text":"Flee the scene","CoinsCost":0,"ReputationEffect":-15,"ResultText":"You escaped, but your reputation suffers."}]

Name: Dream Storm
NarrativeText: Reality itself fractures! All prices become unstable!

Name: Market Surge
NarrativeText: Collectors are seeking memories! Memory ingredients triple in value!

Name: Mysterious Benefactor
Description: A collector offers a rare recipe
NarrativeText: A hooded figure approaches with an intriguing proposition...
ChoicesJson: [{"Id":"accept","Text":"Accept the offer (1000 coins)","CoinsCost":1000,"ReputationEffect":10,"ResultText":"You've gained a rare recipe!","ItemRewards":{"lucid_glass":1}},{"Id":"decline","Text":"Decline politely","CoinsCost":0,"ReputationEffect":0,"ResultText":"The figure vanishes into the mist."}]

Name: Memory Flood
Description: Neuro Harbor is overwhelmed with memories
NarrativeText: Memories wash ashore faster than they can be collected. Prices plummet!

Name: Black Market Opens
NarrativeText: Whispers of a black market reach your ears...
ChoicesJson: [{"Id":"visit","Text":"Visit the black market","CoinsCost":0,"ReputationEffect":-10,"ResultText":"You gain access to forbidden ingredients.","ItemRewards":{"neon_nightmare_shard":2}},{"Id":"report","Text":"Report to authorities","CoinsCost":0,"ReputationEffect":15,"ResultText":"Your standing with the Dream Police improves."}]

Name: Chaos Festival
NarrativeText: The bazaar erupts in colorful mayhem! Chaos ingredients skyrocket!

Name: Enlightenment Wave
NarrativeText: A sense of profound peace washes over the gardens...

Name: Raid Warning
NarrativeText: Word on the street: Dream Police are planning a major operation!
ChoicesJson: [{"Id":"hide_inventory","Text":"Hide volatile inventory (200 coins)","CoinsCost":200,"ReputationEffect":0,"ResultText":"Your volatile ingredients are safely hidden."},{"Id":"risk_it","Text":"Do nothing","CoinsCost":0,"ReputationEffect":0,"ResultText":"You decide to take your chances..."}]
